thread_qcMH3RuUOPagmAew74xgr8fY.message: What did we last talk about?

thread_qcMH3RuUOPagmAew74xgr8fY.speaker: assistant
thread_qcMH3RuUOPagmAew74xgr8fY.message: The last discussion involving your role as the village chief was about the importance of persuading the District Water Engineer to visit your village. The intention is to demonstrate the necessity of a water system for integration into the annual plan【8:0†source】.
